title: Local Cafe
description: Great coffee and fresh daily pastries baked on site.

title: The Bookshop
description: Independent book retailer with a great local history section.

title: Grosvenor Fish Bar
description: Award-winning traditional fish and chips served in an underground bunker.

title: Jarrolds
description: Norwich's flagship independent department store, established in 1823.

title: Cinema City
description: An independent cinema housed in beautifully restored medieval buildings.

title: Fat Cat Brewery Tap
description: A highly acclaimed real ale pub with a vibrant atmosphere and great music.

title: Norwich Playhouse
description: A friendly, relaxed theatre and bar located right by the river.
